404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.subtext_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

forms.post_error: Sorry, looks like something went wrong. Please correct the following and submit again:

homepage.no_products_html: You have no products in your Frontpage collection. This placeholder will appear until you add a product to this collection.
homepage.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default Frontpage.

search.no_results_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" did not yield any results.
search.first_search: Please search using the search bar at the top of the page
search.title: Search our site

onboarding.no_products_html: You have no products in your home page collection. This placeholder will appear until you add a product to this collection.
onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default home page.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.
onboarding.no_socials: To display icons, please provide at least one social link in Theme settings > Social media.

comments.name: Name

comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!
comments.field_error: Not all the fields have been filled out correctly!

form.name: Name

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

menu.set_linklist: You'll need to select a linklist you want to show here, Theme Settings > Site Options

product.thanks: Thanks! We will notify you when this product becomes available!
product.out-stock_html: Click here to be notified by email when {{ product }} becomes available.
product.wrong-email: Please provide a valid email address.
product.view_in_space_label: View in your space, loads item in augmented reality window

stock.items_unavailable_notice: Some items are no longer available. Your bag has been updated.

order_summary.cart_does_not_meet_discount_requirements: <strong style="text-transform:uppercase">{{ code }}< discount code isn't valid for the items in your bag

shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: There are no shipping methods available to your bag or address

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your bag has been updated and the previous shipping rate isn't valid. Select a new rate.
shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Your bag has been updated and the items you added can't be shipped to your address. Remove the items to complete your order.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Some items in your bag can't be shipped to the address you entered. Review your address to ensure that all fields have been entered correctly and try again.

failed_payment.payment_not_processed_text: You haven't been charged. Return to your bag to complete your purchase.

change_country.cart_updated_based_on_country: Your bag has been updated based on your shipping country.

cart.only_n_items_available: You can only add {{ count }} {{ name }} to the bag.
cart.too_many_items_in_cart: You can't add more {{ name }} to the bag.
cart.all_items_in_cart: All {{ count }} {{ name }} are in your bag.
cart.too_many_line_items_error: Your bag cant contain more than {{ max }} items.
cart.stock_problems_html: One or more items are no longer available. We've provided an updated bag.
cart.shipping_address_not_required: This bag does not require shipping
